meanings.sent1: The zincy metal had a shiny appearance.
meanings.sent2: The new roof was zincy and protected from rust.
meanings.sent3: The zincy paint made the old chair look brand new.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and zincy as the morning sun.
meanings.sent5: The zincy taste of the water reminded him of his childhood home.

meanings.sent1: The zincy bucket kept the water cool.
meanings.sent2: The zincy fence gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: She wore a zincy hat to protect herself from the rain.
meanings.sent4: The zincy surface reflected the light like a mirror.
meanings.sent5: The zincy coating on the car prevented corrosion.
